title: Frequently Asked Questions
subText: Stuck somewhere and can’t find solutions? Don’t worry, you can always write to us

subCategories.title: How can I change address or phone number in Order?
subCategories.subText: If you wish to change the shipping address or phone number, you can do it through "My Order" section before the products are dispatched. You will see an edit icon on the order detail page. Please note that you cannot change the address once the order is s

subCategories.title: How do I check the current status of my order?
